content: for the 5mm circular right sleeve backward loop cast on 4 4 4 5 6 needle sts as before and join to front sts k to end of beginning at row right front edge of neck as you are now working on the body sts only work worn join yarn and pick up 11 11 12 13 15 in stocking st and maintain the garter stitch sts across front 9 10 11 11 12 across top of border until work measures 8 5 9 9 5 10 5 12 sleeve 15 16 17 19 21 sts across back inches measuring from the top of the shoulder neck 9 10 11 11 12 across top of other work ½ inch of garter stitch k every row cast sleeve 11 11 12 13 15 across other front off loosely next row button hole row k to 4 stitches before the end of the row k2tog yo k2 work 4 sleeves row of garter st cast off slip one set of sleeve sts off their length of yarn finishing onto a set of 5mm dpns or a 5mm 100cm length circ needle for working magic loop weave in all ends sew on button and block according to the ball band instructions for your chosen yarn © lisa sisk/this is knit 2008 *300420081* e |info@thisisknit ie w |www thisisknit ie
